text: Kacper Kozłowski (born 16 October 2003), is a Polish professional footballer who plays as a midfielder for Pogoń Szczecin.http://www.90minut.pl/kariera.php?id=36136 ==References== ==External links== * Category:2003 births Category:Living people Category:Polish footballers Category:Association football midfielders Category:Pogoń Szczecin players Category:Ekstraklasa players
title: Kacper Kozłowski (footballer)
